name: stealthgame1
description:
You play as a guy who wants to get into a castle filled with monsters to take a shower. But takes a shit in the shower instead, making you the bad guy.

Thank you for coming to my ted talk

changelog v2

 -added input timeout

changelog v3

 -queen nerf (can't go directly next to player)

 -gold squares are used to denote the queen's target square

 -green squares are used if multiple enemies have the same target square
